archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Fusion
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Provide a consolidated source of Customer Billing Account Information, collections status and disputes progress. The intention was to reduce the number of systems a User needs to navigate to for key Customer Billing and Accounts Receivable information Consilida información que necesita el equipo de CFS para gestionar. Desde ahí se puede acceder a varios sistemas Se usa como front end para cargar los tickets en Ops Console
